text: Over the past 57 years, Head Start has grown from an eight-week summer session to a comprehensive program stretching all 50 states and territories. Join us today in celebrating Head Start's 57th birthday: https://t.co/CzSA35rQpp #HappyBdayHeadStart #57YearsOfHeadStart

Going to the grocery store & seeing empty shelves with no infant formula in sight is distressing for any parent. @HouseDemocrats & I are voting for a bill that will help #FeedOurInfants by providing the FDA with the resources it needs to address this shortage https://t.co/iJCDgImcwX

The Office of Management and Budget plays a central role in implementing the President’s budget. Join us for a hearing with @ShalandaYoung46 to ensure they have the funding to support the important work of the Biden-Harris Administration: https://t.co/iGrXk1cTeF

As our defense manufacturing state continues to contribute immediate support to Ukrainian people & support  the fight against Putin’s vicious invasion, we must ensure that funds and equipment provided are put to proper use & US has a stock pile. Watch NOW: https://t.co/hBDm7AU3ra

This week we will work on legislation to help address the supply chain shortages of infant formula. Democrats are committed to helping working families and you can find additional resources here: https://t.co/wq7NYUAtBb

I'm proud to highlight our 2022 Art Competition Winner: Sydney Kim; her art is titled "Let It Not Happen Again."

The art portrays the heartbreaking reality for many families in Ukraine, having to say goodbye. I am incredibly proud of all the talent in Southern Arizona. https://t.co/K6HytLR31J

Communities must be equipped with the tools they need to lift families out of poverty. This week, I voted to pass legislation that will deliver resources to local community organizations across Arizona to help Americans achieve economic security.
If the SCOTUS Roe v. Wade draft ruling is handed down, this decision would mean that, for the FIRST TIME in our history, America’s daughters will have LESS freedom than their mothers. #ProtectRoe

Today, I had a hearing with @usairforce & @SpaceForceDoD to discuss funding priorities and I had the opportunity to emphasize the importance of the A-10 missions and it’s unmatched capabilities. ➡ https://t.co/pBNO1qMgAD
